alert.note: Alert for Weston (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 11 at 9:58PM MDT until June 11 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 347 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 11 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN SOUTH DAKOTA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 9 COUNTIES IN NORTHWEST SOUTH DAKOTA BUTTE HARDING PERKINS IN SOUTHWEST SOUTH DAKOTA JACKSON IN WEST CENTRAL SOUTH DAKOTA HAAKON LAWRENCE MEADE PENNINGTON ZIEBACH IN WYOMING THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN NORTHEAST WYOMING WESTON THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF BILLSBURG, BISON, BUCKHORN, BUFFALO, CLARETON, DEADWOOD, DOWNTOWN BELLE FOURCHE, DOWNTOWN NEWCASTLE, DUPREE, FAITH, FOUR CORNERS, HILL CITY, KADOKA, KIRLEY, LEAD, LEMMON, MILESVILLE, MORRISEY, PHILIP, RAPID CITY, ROCHELLE, SPEARFISH, STURGIS, UNION CENTER, UPTON, AND WALL. THIS INCLUDES THE TRIBAL LANDS OF THE CHEYENNE RIVER RESERVATION AND THE PINE RIDGE RESERVATION.
